scripts.watch-consumer: nodemon --exec 'sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/consumer.scss dist/consumer.css && yarn prettier --write dist/consumer.css' --ext css,scss --watch src
scripts.watch-skeleton: nodemon --exec 'sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/skeleton.scss dist/skeleton.css && yarn prettier --write dist/skeleton.css' --ext css,scss --watch src
scripts.build-css-dev: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/development.scss dist/development.css && yarn prettier --write dist/development.css
scripts.build-css-dev-full: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/development-full.scss dist/development-full.css && yarn prettier --write dist/development-full.css
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn concurrently --raw 'yarn build-css-dev' 'yarn build-css-dev-full' 'yarn build-css-prod' 'yarn build-css-prod-full' 'yarn build-js'
